messages.message:
Hi team, i just pushed this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/74202) which affects fields in projects / apps. If you get an error on your crafting sandbox relating to fields, please run this command on your sandbox:

`DB_PARAMS="--username=root --host=mysql --database=ibdb --port=3306" go run instabase/utils/db/tools/dbmigrate`

Relevant DB Migration Section (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mM32cCbi4NFtphnlu1T8rtsc0lsfj3FZWfNrKmui34M/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.uigwvfmjos5m)
This PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/74439) will need to be patched as well prior to running the command above
